projects.title: Calculator Mobile App
projects.description: Functioning calculator App in Flutter/Dart with light and dark mode toggle switch. Shared Preferences keeps the users dark or light mode selection even after the app closes.

projects.title: Vue Online Chat Client
projects.description: Vue Chat webapp built with VueJS 3, TailwindCSS and Firebase for Google and GitHub authentication, and realtime firestore database. Uses VueRouter to redirect to Chat screen when logged in.

projects.title: Flutter Pokédex Mobile App
projects.description: Pokédex Index App built using Dart and Flutter. View Pokemon sprites, pokedex entries, stats, evolutions and type advantages/weaknesses in battle.

projects.title: Amiibo Tracker
projects.description: Catalog the Amiibo you've collected! Vue project built with Vue and BootstrapVue. Loads all Amiibo data from AmiiboApi.

projects.title: React Invoice Generator
projects.description: An Invoice creator project built with React. Add itemized items, configure quantity, prices, tax rates and discounts. Download Invoice as PDFs to your device. Uses jspdf-react to capture the data from the modal and covert it from canvas -> pdf.

projects.title: vue-95
projects.description: Recreation of the Windows 95 Operating System built with Vue 3 JS.

projects.title: johnuberbacher.com
projects.description: This website was built from the ground up with Vue JS and Tailwind CSS. Projects are passed in as components and are automatically generated with JSON. Design by John Uberbacher.

projects.title: Vue Compound Interest Calculator
projects.description: Single Page VueJS Application. Enter initial principal amount, interest rate, time duration (in months or years), cycles year/month that the interest compounds. Built using Vue2 and TailwindCSS.
